scene_description_enriched: The Virgin Mary, depicted with a serene expression, holds the Christ Child in her arms. She is adorned in a blue mantle and a white veil, standing against a radiant golden background. Rays of light emanate from behind her, suggesting divine presence. Below them, a crescent moon and turbulent blue waves are visible, symbolizing her role as the "Woman of the Apocalypse" from the Book of Revelation. The scene is framed by ornate blue drapery and floral motifs, indicative of a manuscript illumination.
scene_interpretation: The Virgin Mary, Woman of the Apocalypse
